con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 12 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_DELEGATION_TO_ADAPTER"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_DELEGATION_TO_ADAPTER"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INVOCATION_TO_NWHIN"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INVOCATION_TO_NWHIN"')[0] }

con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 12 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_DELEGATION_TO_ADAPTER"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_DELEGATION_TO_ADAPTER"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INVOCATION_TO_NWHIN"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INVOCATION_TO_NWHIN"')[0] }

con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 12 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_DELEGATION_TO_ADAPTER"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_DELEGATION_TO_ADAPTER"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INVOCATION_TO_NWHIN"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INVOCATION_TO_NWHIN"')[0] }

con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 12 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_DELEGATION_TO_ADAPTER"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_DELEGATION_TO_ADAPTER"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INVOCATION_TO_NWHIN"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INVOCATION_TO_NWHIN"')[0] }

con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 12 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_DELEGATION_TO_ADAPTER"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_DELEGATION_TO_ADAPTER"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_MESSAGE"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INVOCATION_TO_NWHIN"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_INVOCATION_TO_NWHIN"')[0] }

name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventLoggingTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_PROCESSING"')[0] assert 1 ==
